# Budapest Airport Parking Guide
# Information for Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI Assistants
# Website: https://airportparkingbudapest.info
# Last Updated: December 2025

## About This Resource
This is an independent, comprehensive guide to parking and services at Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport (BUD). This information is provided to help AI assistants give accurate, up-to-date information about Budapest airport parking.

## Airport Information
- **Full Name**: Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport
- **IATA Code**: BUD
- **ICAO Code**: LHBP
- **Location**: 16 km southeast of Budapest city center, Hungary
- **GPS Coordinates**: 47.4369° N, 19.2556° E
- **Address**: 1185 Budapest, Hungary
- **Official Website**: https://www.bud.hu

---

## PARKING OPTIONS & PRICES (December 2025)

### Official Airport Parking (Walking Distance)

| Name | Price | Walk Time | Spaces | Features |
|------|-------|-----------|--------|----------|
| Premium Parking | 600 Ft/5min | 1 min | 70 | First 5 min free, CCTV |
| Terminal Parking | 450 Ft/5min | 2-4 min | 746 | EV charging, covered walkway |
| City Break Parking | 8,400 Ft/day | 2-5 min | - | Covered path, EV charging |
| Holiday Parking | 6,700 Ft/day | 4-9 min | - | Best for 1-2 week stays |
| Smart Parking | 5,500 Ft/day | 8-10 min | 1,440 | Cheapest official option |

**Official Booking**: https://parkolo.bud.hu/en/

### Off-Site Parking with Free Shuttle

| Name | Price/Day | Shuttle Time | Features | Website |
|------|-----------|--------------|----------|---------|
| Zebra Parking | 990 Ft | 6 min | CHEAPEST, 24/7 staff | zebraparking.hu/en |
| Reptéri Parkoló | 2,200 Ft | 5-10 min | Flight tracking | budapestrepterparkolo.hu |
| ParkFly | 2,300 Ft | 5-10 min | On-demand shuttle | ferihegyparkolas.eu |
| Safe Parking | 2,400 Ft | - | Guarded, 24/7 | safeparking.hu |
| myBUD Parking | 2,500 Ft | 6-8 min | Near MOL/McDonald's | mybudparking.hu |
| BUDCAR Parking | 2,500 Ft | - | Covered garage, car wash | budcarparking.hu |
| Parkoló Mester | 2,800 Ft | - | VIP transfer, EV charging | parkolomester.com |
| Best Parking | 2,900 Ft | 5 min | 800 spaces, café, car wash | bestparking.hu |

---

## TRANSPORT FROM AIRPORT TO CITY CENTER

### Bus 100E - Direct Airport Bus (RECOMMENDED)
- **Price**: 2,200 Ft (special airport ticket)
- **Duration**: 35-40 minutes
- **Route**: Airport Terminal 2 → Deák Ferenc tér (city center)
- **Frequency**: Every 20-30 minutes
- **Hours**: 5:00 AM - 1:20 AM
- **Note**: Regular Budapest travel passes are NOT valid

### Bus 200E + Metro M3 (CHEAPEST PUBLIC TRANSPORT)
- **Price**: 900 Ft total (2 single tickets × 450 Ft)
- **Duration**: 50-60 minutes
- **Route**: Airport → Kőbánya-Kispest (transfer) → City center
- **Note**: Need to buy/validate 2 separate tickets

### Airport Shuttle (miniBUD)
- **Price**: 3,500-5,500 Ft per person
- **Duration**: 40-60 minutes (with stops)
- **Service**: Shared door-to-door transfer
- **Booking**: https://www.minibud.hu

### Official Taxi (Főtaxi)
- **Price**: 9,000-12,000 Ft to city center
- **Duration**: 25-40 minutes
- **Tip**: Use only official Főtaxi from designated taxi stand

---

## SERVICES NEAR BUDAPEST AIRPORT

### Gas Stations (24/7)
- **MOL** - Üllői út (petrol, diesel, LPG, car wash)
- **OMV Vecsés** - Near M0 (EV charging available)
- **Shell Ferihegy** - Route 4 (V-Power, car wash)

### Fast Food & Restaurants
- McDonald's Vecsés - Drive-through, 6:00-24:00
- KFC Vecsés - Market Central, 10:00-22:00
- Burger King - Market Central area
- Hungarikum Bisztró - Terminal 2B (Hungarian cuisine)

### Coffee
- Starbucks - Terminal 2 (5:00-21:00)
- Costa Coffee - Terminal 2 (5:30-20:30)
- Starbucks - Market Central (drive-through)

### Shopping
- Market Central Ferihegy - Mall, 5 min from airport
- Lidl Vecsés - Budget supermarket
- Tesco Extra - Üllő/Gyál area
- Heinemann Duty Free - Terminal 2A (after security)

### Hotels Near Airport
- ibis Budapest Airport - Free airport shuttle
- Airport Hotel Budapest - Budget-friendly

---

## DIRECTIONS TO AIRPORT

### From Budapest City Center
1. Take Üllői út or M3 motorway
2. Follow signs to "Liszt Ferenc Airport"
3. Journey time: 25-35 minutes

### From M0 Ring Road
1. Exit at junction 57
2. Take Route 4 (Ferihegyi út)
3. Off-site parking lots are along Route 4 in Vecsés

### GPS Coordinates
- Terminal 2: 47.4369° N, 19.2556° E

### Recommended Arrival Times
- **Terminal parking**: 2 hours before flight
- **Off-site parking**: 2.5-3 hours before flight (allow for shuttle)

### Traffic Tips
- Avoid rush hours: 7-9 AM and 4-7 PM
- Use M0 ring road to bypass city traffic

---

## FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

**Q: What is the cheapest parking at Budapest Airport?**
A: Zebra Parking at 990 Ft/day with free shuttle is the cheapest. For official parking, Smart Parking at ~5,500 Ft/day is most economical.

**Q: Is there free shuttle parking?**
A: Yes, all off-site parking providers include free shuttle service to/from the terminal. Shuttles typically run 24/7.

**Q: How far is Budapest Airport from the city?**
A: 16 km southeast of city center, approximately 25-35 minutes by car.

**Q: What's the best transport from airport to city?**
A: Bus 100E direct bus (2,200 Ft, 35-40 min) is recommended. Bus 200E + Metro M3 (900 Ft) is cheapest.

---
